        private void startExecution()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Manages the classification and evaluation process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if any file is missing or corrupt.

      • loadConfig

        private void loadConfig()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all data from the config.properties file. The file must be inside the resources folder inside the project's root folder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException if the config.properties file is missing or corrupt.

      • loadCorpus

        private void loadCorpus()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if file is missing or corrupt.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws ClassNotFoundException if file does not contain a Corpus object.

      • exportResults

        private void exportResults(java.lang.String exportPath,
                           Result resultClassification,
                           Result resultModifier,
                           Result resultModifierSimple)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Exports the annotated test corpus and the results of the classification and modifier detection.
        Parameters:
        exportPath - Path where the results will be saved.
        resultClassification - Results of the classification.
        resultModifier - Results of the modifier detection.
        resultModifierSimple - Results of the modifier detection using the simple evaluation method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if export files can not be created.

      • generateWeightMatricesString

        private java.lang.String generateWeightMatricesString(double[][][] weightMatrices)
        Transforms weight matrices into a string.
        Parameters:
        weightMatrices - The to be exported weight matrices.
        Returns:
        Returns the weight matrices in a string format.

      • exportCorpus

        private void exportCorpus(java.lang.String exportPath)
        Exports the used corpus object containing the training and test data. Also contains the annotations made by the modifier detection.
        Parameters:
        exportPath - Path where the corpus should be saved.

      • generateCorporaString

        private java.lang.String generateCorporaString(int i)
        Generates a string for a Tweet that contains all essential informations like gold Emotion, predicted Emotion, original text, tokens, ... .
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the Tweet in the test set.
        Returns:
        Returns a string containing all information/annotations of this specific Tweet.

      • generateResultStringClassification

        private java.lang.String generateResultStringClassification(Result resultClassification)
        Creates a string containing all results of the emotion classification.
        Parameters:
        resultClassification - Containing all results of the emotion classification.
        Returns:
        Returns a string that contains all results of the emotion classification.

      • generateResultStringModifier

        private java.lang.String generateResultStringModifier(Result resultModifier)
        Creates a string containing all results of the modifier detection evaluation.
        Parameters:
        resultModifier - Containing all results of the modifier detection evaluation.
        Returns:
        Returns a string that contains all results of the modifier detection evaluation.

      • generateExperimentSetupString

        private java.lang.String generateExperimentSetupString(Result resultClassification)
        Creates a string containing all settings of this experiment.
        Parameters:
        resultClassification - Containing all results of the emotion classification.
        Returns:
        Returns a string that contains all all settings of this experiment.

      • createCorpora

        private void createCorpora()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates training and test corpora
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException if the testData or trainingData file is missing or corrupt.

      • classify

        private void classify()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the classification with a specific classification method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException if the emotion lexicon file is missing/corrupt but the word list classification approach is used.

      • loadWeightMatrices

        private double[][][] loadWeightMatrices(java.io.File weightMatricesFile)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Transforms the weight matrices string in the file into an array containing all values.
        Parameters:
        weightMatricesFile - File that contains the weight matrices as a string.
        Returns:
        Returns an array that contains all values of the weight matrices
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if the weight matrices file is corrupt.

      • detectModifier

        private void detectModifier()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the modifier detection process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException if the negation-/intensifier-/diminisher lexicon is missing or corrupt.
